question:
Consider the following statements about the Restoration Opportunities Assessment Methodology (ROAM):
  1. It has been produced jointly by IUCN and the World Resources Institute (WRI)
  2. It helps the countries to implement the forest restoration programmes
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The Restoration Opportunities Assessment Methodology (ROAM) is produced by IUCN and the World Resources Institute (WRI). It provides a flexible and affordable framework for countries to rapidly identify and analyse areas for forest landscape restoration (FLR). ROAM will also enable countries to define and implement national or sub national contributions to the Bonn Challenge and concurrently allow nations to meet existing international commitments under the Convention on Biological Diversity, United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification and the United Nations Framework to Combat Climate Change.
